title: Privacy AI
description: Just a mobile and desktop app that lets you run advanced AI models entirely offline, ensuring total privacy (no data collection). It features models like LLaMA and Mistral, with customizable settings to fine-tune your interactions. The app is available for iPhone, iPad, and Mac, and offers both free and premium options, including a one-time purchase model. If you’re looking for AI on device easy and offline with no privacy compromises, this app is designed for you.
